CASE WHEN SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT) * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT < 30 THEN FLOOR(SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT) || '일 전' WHEN SYSDATE - R.CREATED_AT < 365 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE-R.CREATED_AT)/30) || '달 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATED_AT , BUYER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME,PROFILE_IMG, SUBSTR(MEMBER_ADDRESS,11,3) MEMBER_ADDRESS FROM REVIEW R JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) JOIN GOODS_SELL G ON(G.GOODS_NO = R.GOODS_NO) WHERE RECEIVER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY R.CREATED_AT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
